points: To prepare the students with strong fundamental concepts, analytical capability, programming and problem solving skills.
To develop a modern infrastructure, computing and soft skill and reforming teaching learning process using latest tools, technologies and pedagogies.

To create and ambience of education in the department through departmental seminars, R & D activities and interaction with professional societies and industries as well as providing ample opportunities in various curricular and co-curricular activities.
To inculcate universal human values among the students to make them a responsible citizen.
To achieve academic excellence by nurturing well-rounded, competent computer science students.
To equip students with industry-relevant knowledge and skills that ensure employability and career readiness.
To foster innovation and creativity for successful entrepreneurship and tech-driven ventures.
To encourage pursuit of higher education and research for lifelong learning and academic growth.
To instill ethical values, social responsibility, and a commitment to contribute meaningfully to society and the nation.
